articles.title: Karun Nair is the Indian batter who has played me best, says Trent Boult - CricTracker
articles.description: Trent Boult lauds Karun Nair for his ability to play him in the nets and face every kind of delivery that the pacers throws at him
articles.content:
Trent Boult and Karun Nair (Photo Source: IPL/BCCI)
Deadly Rajasthan Royals pacer Trent Boult has said that Karun Nair is the Indian batter who plays him the best. He feels that his Royals teammate … [+1599 chars]
